briefdescription.para: Get default configuration according to input pixel format.
Get default plane configuration according input pixel format.
Get default YUV2RGB coefficient configuration according to input pixel format.

simplesect.para: The two plane share one YUV2RGB_COEF, so not support convert one plane YUV422 format and another plane YCbCr422 format at same time

parameterdescription.para: the YUV2RGB input source pixel format

detaileddescription.para: Note: The plane_src and plane_dst share one YUV2RGB_COEF, so not support convert one plane YUV422 format and another plane YCbCr422 format at same time

memberdef.argsstring: (PDMA_Type *ptr, uint32_t dst, uint32_t dst_width, uint32_t width, uint32_t height, uint32_t color, uint8_t alpha, display_pixel_format_t format, bool wait, uint32_t *status)
memberdef.name: pdma_fill_color

parameterdescription.para: status_success if flip and rotate plane without any error
